thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Andrea

author: Andrea
title: Andrea
text:
No frills, just clear and concise directions. In the past, I have completed orders with other companies before I was ready because they didn't designate that the step was the last before purchase (button simply said continue rather than complete). I like that I was able to review the order even up until the end.
More importantly, choosing the style prior to checkout was great. Not too many choices that it's overwhelming but enough that I felt there would be at least one option for any kid.
